005
006package gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model.constraint;
007
008import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model.IModule;
009import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.util.CollectionUtil;
010import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.util.ObjectUtils;
011
012import java.net.URI;
013import java.util.Collections;
014import java.util.List;
015import java.util.Map;
016import java.util.Set;
017import java.util.stream.Collectors;
018
019import javax.xml.namespace.QName;
020
021import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.NonNull;
022
023public class DefaultConstraintSet implements IConstraintSet {
024  @NonNull
025  private final URI resourceLocation;
026  @NonNull
027  private final Set<IConstraintSet> importedConstraintSets;
028  @NonNull
029  private final Map<QName, List<IScopedContraints>> scopedContraints;
030
031  /**
032   * Construct a new constraint set.
033   *
034   * @param resourceLocation
035   *          the resource the constraint was provided from
036   * @param scopedContraints
037   *          a set of constraints qualified by a scope path
038   * @param importedConstraintSets
039   *          constraint sets imported by this constraint set
040   */
041  @SuppressWarnings("null")
042  public DefaultConstraintSet(
043      @NonNull URI resourceLocation,
044      @NonNull List<IScopedContraints> scopedContraints,
045      @NonNull Set<IConstraintSet> importedConstraintSets) {
046    this.resourceLocation = resourceLocation;
047    this.scopedContraints = scopedContraints.stream()
048        .collect(
049            Collectors.collectingAndThen(
050                Collectors.groupingBy(
051                    scope -> new QName(scope.getModuleNamespace().toString(), scope.getModuleShortName()),
052                    Collectors.toUnmodifiableList()),
053                Collections::unmodifiableMap));
054    this.importedConstraintSets = CollectionUtil.unmodifiableSet(importedConstraintSets);
055  }
056
057  /**
058   * Get the resource the constraint was provided from.
059   *
060   * @return the resource
061   */
062  @NonNull
063  protected URI getResourceLocation() {
064    return resourceLocation;
065  }
066
067  /**
068   * Get the set of Metaschema scoped constraints to apply by a {@link QName}
069   * formed from the Metaschema namespace and short name.
070   *
071   * @return the mapping of QName to scoped constraints
072   */
073  @NonNull
074  public Map<QName, List<IScopedContraints>> getScopedContraints() {
075    return scopedContraints;
076  }
077
078  @Override
079  public Set<IConstraintSet> getImportedConstraintSets() {
080    return importedConstraintSets;
081  }
082
083  @Override
084  public Iterable<ITargetedConstraints> getTargetedConstraintsForModule(@NonNull IModule module) {
085    QName qname = module.getQName();
086
087    Map<QName, List<IScopedContraints>> map = getScopedContraints();
088    List<IScopedContraints> scopes = map.getOrDefault(qname, CollectionUtil.emptyList());
089    return CollectionUtil.toIterable(ObjectUtils.notNull(scopes.stream()
090        .flatMap(scoped -> scoped.getTargetedContraints().stream())));
091  }
092
093}
